channel.title: Easy debdelta intergration for x64 hosts?
channel.description:
x64 is currently supported by Debian's default delta server. The relevant links and onion addresses are on debian's onion site.
An easy switch or option would be nice. There are bandwidth, speed, and potentially privacy gains through deltas. This may also be viable for Kicksecure.
